tool_description: Generates seasonal ingredient recommendations and menu concepts based on time of year, location, and culinary preferences for optimal freshness and flavor.

season.description: Target season: spring, summer, fall, winter

meal_types.description: Types of meals to plan for

dietary_preferences.description: Dietary restrictions or preferences to accommodate

error_messages: Invalid season: Use one of [spring, summer, fall, winter].
Location format error: Use standard geographic format like 'California, USA' or 'Tuscany, Italy'.
Unrecognized cuisine: Use recognized cuisine names or 'any' for no preference.
Invalid meal type: Use standard meal types like breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack, appetizer, dessert.
Ingredient not seasonal: Some focus ingredients may not be available in the specified season and location.
usage: Provide season and location, then optionally specify cuisine preferences, meal types, dietary preferences, and focus ingredients. Returns seasonal menu suggestions optimized for local availability.

peak_seasonal_ingredients.description: Ingredients at peak freshness and availability

menu_concepts.description: Seasonal menu ideas incorporating peak ingredients

preservation_methods.description: Suggested methods for preserving seasonal abundance

seasonal_cooking_techniques.description: Cooking methods that complement the season

planning_timeline.description: Timeline for optimal ingredient procurement and menu execution
